titles.title: Must Jesus Bear The Cross Alone (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Must Jesus bear the cross alone And all the world go free No there's a cross for ev'ry one And there's a cross for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}How happy are the saints above Who once went sorr'wing here But now they taste unmingled love And joy without a tear{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The consecrated cross I'll bear Till death shall set me free And then go home my crown to wear For there's a crown for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Upon the crystal pavement down At Jesus' pierced feet Joyful I'll cast my golden crown And His dear name repeat{/lang-eng}
